entry.title: Programming And Scripting Languages
entry.summary: Programming And Scripting Languages We often use phrases like scripting in python and programming in java, but is there any difference? Most people use the terms, programming and scripting synonymously, but they do have different meanings. All scripting languages are programming languages, all programming languages are not scripting languages. Simply said, scripting languages are a subset...
